refnamediv.refpurpose: Sets a lower local sampling rate based on an undersampling factor.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Sets the local sampling rate value in a user-defined opcode block.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: ifactor -- sets the undersampling factor. It needs to be a positive integer > 1. A factor of 1 is a non-op, zero or negative factors are illegal. The local sampling rate is set as (1/ifactor) * sr. The value of the sr variable is then changed locally. Local ksmps is also changed accordingly.
imode -- resampling mode: if Secret Rabbit Code is used, then 0 - best quality sync (default); 1 - medium quality sync; 2 - fast sync; 3 - zero-order hold; and 4 - linear.

note.title: Note
note.para: Calling this opcode in the same UDO as setksmps is not allowed. The opcode can only be used in UDOs. Audio or control rate array arguments are not allowed. Global variables or bus channels should not be used.
